items.title: BlackRock Advantage CoreAlpha Bond Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
items.description: The fund posted returns of -3.12% (Institutional shares) and -3.18% (Investor A shares, without sales charge) for the fourth quarter of 2024. Read more here.

items.title: JPMorgan Chase Raises Dividend 12%
items.description: By Connor Hart JPMorgan Chase & Co. increased its dividend to $1.40 from $1.25. The new payout, equal to $5.60 a year, represents an annual yield of 2.4% based on its latest closing price of...
